review: Maybe the tech isn't there yet.  I don't know.  The remote constantly disconnects unless I use the extension HDMI.  But honestly, I bought the stick so it would hide behind the TV, not hang down below it.  Netflix streams like crap compared to my other WIFI devices.  Buffers during every 30 minute episode.  It's not the WIFI, because amazon movies stream perfectly.  I'm honestly disappointed.  Every feature I liked about it, or wanted it for, appears to be less than adequate.  Probably going to replace it with a roku.
